testCheckWin() - Method in class GameTest
CheckWin method checks if the current player has no more cards left and if yes sets the boolean isOver to true
Test if game ends if current player has one card left and plays it.
testClaim() - Method in class GameTest
We test four scenarios.
1.
testCorrectParsing() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: User provides different inputs when trying to make a turn
(and claim the one that has been previously done)
Testing if inputCheckForCommand parses the input correctly and returns the correct array accordingly
testDrawTwo() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After any card
Test if the draw two card is an accepted play and if the drawTwo method places the card on the deck.
testGetNextPlayer() - Method in class GameTest
Adds two players to the game, sets current player to the first player of the list and checks if the getNextPlayer method returns the second player of the list.
testInputCheckForCommand() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: User provides different inputs when trying to make a turn (and claim the one that has been previously done) Testing if inputCheckForCommand only accepts correct notations of turn inputs
testInputCheckForName() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: User provides different inputs when providing player name Testing if inputCheckNumber only accepts integers
testInputCheckNumber() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: User provides a number input for the amount of players Testing if inputCheckNumber only accepts integers
testNumberCardAfterPlusTwoCard() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After a draw two wildcard of color blue was played
Test if the next normal card of the next player is a legal play.
testNumberCardAfterReverse() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After a reverse card was played
Test if the next normal card of the next player is a legal play
testNumberCardAfterSkipCard() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After a skip card was played
Test if the next normal card of the next player is a legal play
testNumberCardAfterWildCard() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After a wildcard was played and the color blue was chosen
Test if the next normal card of the next player is a legal play
testNumberCardAfterWildCardDrawFour() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After a draw four wildcard was played and the chosen color = green
Testing if the normal card played immediately after is a valid play.
testNumberCardOnNumberCard() - Method in class GameTest
Tests if the normal card that the current player wants to play is a valid play
and if the numberCard method pushes the card to the deck.
testReshuffle() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: The draw deck is empty, so we take the play deck except the last card, reshuffle it and store as the draw deck.
testReverse() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After any card
Test if the reverse card is an accepted play and if the reverse method places the reverse card on the deck
testSkip() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After any card
Test if the skip card is an accepted play and if the skip method places the skip card on the deck.
testWildCard() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After any card
Test if a wild card is accepted as the next card in the game
testWildDrawFour() - Method in class GameTest
Scenario: After any card
Test if the draw four card is accepted
